You will be responsible for building and engaging with social media communities for our clients’ brands. The role also requires you to ideate content that are fit for the platform and aligns with the brand’s social strategy. You will work and partner with other experts at {company} to grow and excel.

Be up to date on social media trends across Tiktok
Monitor and perform analysis on content performance.
Optimize social strategies based on industry updates and audience insights.
Maintain relationship and collaborate with clients as well as internal and external partners.
At least 1-3 years of work experiences in the field of social media marketing or advertising.

Experience with social media management and social listening tools like sprinklr

We are looking for enthusiastic and creative individuals who are on the pulse of social media. You will be responsible for building and engaging with social media communities for our clients’ brands. The role also requires you to ideate content that are fit for the platform and aligns with the brand’s social strategy. You will work and partner with other experts at Ogilvy to grow and excel.

MAIN JOB TASKS & RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Understand the client’s briefs and campaign objectives.
  • Understand the brand’s social tone and content strategy.
  • Ideate and conceptualize content for brand’s social media pages.
  • Upload and schedule content as per content calendar.
  • Engage with audiences on the brand’s page.
  • Be up to date on social media trends across Tiktok
column4:
Facebook and other social platforms.
  • Monitor and perform analysis on content performance.
  • Optimize social strategies based on industry updates and audience insights.
  • Maintain relationship and collaborate with clients as well as internal and external partners.

column1:
JOB REQUIREMENTS

  • At least 1-3 years of work experiences in the field of social media marketing or advertising.
  • Knowledge of social platform landscape and best practices.
  • Understanding of social media KPIs.
  • Experience with social media management and social listening tools like sprinklr
column3:
NewsWhip etc.
  • Ability to ideate and conceptualize social content.
  • Good time-management and multi-tasking skills.
  • A learning and growth mindset.

The ideal candidate loves talking to people and proactively solving issues. You will be responsible for converting customers into passionate evangelists

Responsibilities

  • Pick-up call from prospects or customers.

  • Follow-up abandonment cart prospects from all sales channels.
  • Update daily & weekly sales report.
  • Execute sales event planned by superior.
  • Perform any other duties assigned by immediate superior.

Qualifications
